title: How do I set emails?
answer:
Adding an email account 

 Touch Settings > Add account. Touch Email to add an email account or Corporate to add an Exchange account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110578) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110579) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110580) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110581) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110582)

 Manual setup: 

 1. On the Account setup screen, type the account and password. 

 2. Touch Manual setup. 

 3. Touch POP3. Set the receive server. 

 4. Touch Next. Set the send server. 

 5. Touch Next. Set the inbox checking frequency. 

 6. Touch Next. Set your name and your account name. 

 7. Touch Next. Log in to the inbox screen. 

 Automatic setup: (Email parameters are preset on your phone.) 

 1. On the Account setup screen, type the account and password. 

 1. Click Next. 

 1. Touch Next. Set the inbox checking frequency. 

 1. Touch Next. Set your name and your account name. 

 1. Touch Next. Log in to the inbox screen. 

 If no email parameters are preset, contact your email service provider. 

 Sending an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110583). On the Compose screen, enter the recipient, subject, and content. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110584). 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110585)

 Checking and deleting emails 

 On the inbox screen, touch an email to check it or touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110586) to delete it. 

 Deleting an email account 

 [On the inbox screen, touch the menu key and touch Settings. Touch the account you want to delete and swipe to the bottom and delete it. ]()
